sections.heading: Guard; arms; supplies; issuance
sections.text: Arms, accoutrements, ammunition, supplies and stores shall be issued to the proper officers of each organization upon requisition as prescribed by the laws or regulations of the United States.SourceLaws 1929, c. 189, § 18, p. 661;C.S.1929, § 55-123;R.S.1943, § 55-126;

55-149.National Guard; arms; supplies; issuance.

Arms, accoutrements, ammunition, supplies and stores shall be issued to the proper officers of each organization upon requisition as prescribed by the laws or regulations of the United States.

SourceLaws 1929, c. 189, § 18, p. 661;C.S.1929, § 55-123;R.S.1943, § 55-126;Laws 1969, c. 459, § 47, p. 1597.
